Putin and Iran's Raisi to sign new interstate treaty soon - RussiaRussia's foreign ministry said on Wednesday that it expected President Vladimir Putin and his Iranian counterpart to soon sign a new interstate treaty between the two countries which was in the final stages of being agreed. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 10:41:04 GMT FZGWNVBSFVNCVMQPCEULJOCBDE https://www.reuters.com/world/putin-irans-raisi-sign-new-interstate-treaty-soon-Russia-2024-01-17/Reuters世界
Around 20 people killed in explosion at Thai firework factory - policeAround 20 people were killed in Thailand in an explosion on Wednesday at a firework factory, police said. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 10:31:36 GMT Z7LS5VIM5JN4XPJUMBZIZA7CCY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/around-20-people-killed-explosion-thai-firework-factory-police-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
Belgium PM says a mechanism is needed for confiscation of 280 billion euros of Russian assetsBelgium does not oppose the confiscation of 280 billion euros worth of frozen Russian central bank assets, but there needs to be a clear mechanism such as using the assets as collateral for Ukraine, Prime Minister Alexander De Croo told Reuters. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 10:29:04 GMT OKYWHRT255NBXL65IN3EFN​​XC5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/belgium-pm-says-mechanism-is-needed-confiscation-280-billion-euros- Russian-2024-01-17/Dmitry Zhdannikov商业达沃斯
Romanian farmers, hauliers ramp up protests, block Ukraine border accessHundreds of Romanian farmers and truck drivers ramped up a week-long protest against high business costs on Wednesday, blocking access to a border crossing with Ukraine and protesting on the outskirts of capital Bucharest. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 10:25:42 GMT IKRSWPCA2ZJUJD6SI4O55ADY4M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/romanian-farmers-hauliers-ramp-up-protests-block-ukraine-border-access-2024-01-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Court orders Dutch state to give more detail on 2015 Iraq air strikeA Dutch court on Wednesday ordered the Netherlands' government to supply more documents in a civil case by more than 20 victims of a Dutch air strike against an alleged Islamic State bomb factory in northern Iraq in 2015. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 10:17:44 GMT 2CMDMNO53VOLHPZ22UHUIBQAEA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/court-orders-dutch-state-give-more-detail-2015-iraq-air-strike-2024-01-17/Reuters世界欧洲
UN chief says parties to Gaza war 'trampling' on international lawUnited Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said on Wednesday that parties to the conflict in Gaza were "trampling" on international law and urged them to implement an immediate humanitarian ceasefire. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 10:11:12 GMT W6ZUQYUPWROXHBJSW2F6JHNZCU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-chief-says-parties-gaza-war-trampling-international-law-2024-01-17/Reuters商业达沃斯
Aleph Farms gets approval to sell cultivated steaks in IsraelIsraeli food-tech start-up Aleph Farms said on Wednesday it received regulatory approval in Israel to sell steak grown from cow cells in a process that effectively takes the animal itself out of the equation. Thai court dismisses terrorism charges against activists for 2008 airports closureA Thai court on Wednesday dismissed terrorism charges against 32 political activists who led an anti-government protest that shut down Bangkok's two main international airports in 2008, their lawyer said. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 10:08:13 GMT MM22FIIOMFLNTLHDD3OIHFC23Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thai-court-dismisses-error-charges-against-activists-2008-airports-closure-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
Von der Leyen confident all EU states will agree on aid package to UkraineThe European Union's chief executive voiced confidence on Wednesday that all 27 member states will agree to jointly extend more financial aid to Ukraine. Ukraine says it works with EU to make future border blockades impossibleKyiv and Brussels are developing safeguards to make it impossible in the future to block the land borders of Ukraine and the European Union, Ukrainian deputy infrastructure minister Serhiy Derkach said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 09:58:26 GMT PYVV5Z773JMZZATGDQSWZNB3HU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says-it-works-with-eu-make-future-border-blockades-impossible-2024-01-17/Reuters世界欧洲
'Nazis, no thank you'; Germans take to streets to call for AfD banProtests against the far-right Alternative for Germany party are gaining momentum in the wake of a report that two senior party members joined a meeting to discuss plans for the mass deportation of citizens of foreign origin. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 09:49:56 GMT OQ2UR2YXEFJFVATUZT7KL7TLCI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/nazis-no-thank-you-germans-take-streets-call-afd-ban-2024-01-17/Sarah Marsh, Petra Wischgoll世界欧洲
